sentences.en: A maladroit movement of his hand caused the car to swerve.
sentences.cn: 他的手笨拙的移动使得车突然转向.

sentences.en: A mix of live action and CG animation, the story starts in the Middle Ages, when the maladroit sorcerer Gargamel (Hank Azaria) finally discovers the location of Smurf Village.
sentences.cn: 混合真人实景和计算机绘图动画，这个起源于中世纪的故事，笨拙的巫师格格巫（汉克 阿扎利亚）最终发现了蓝精灵村的所在地。

sentences.en: His handling of the negotiations was maladroit.
sentences.cn: 他的谈判技巧十分拙劣.

sentences.en: Some of his first interviews with the press were rather maladroit.
sentences.cn: 他最早接受媒体采访时有几次显得很生涩。

words.tran_cn: 笨拙的；不灵巧的；愚钝的

trans.tran_cn: 不机敏的，笨拙的，粗手笨脚
trans.tran_en: not clever or sensitive in the way you deal with people
